name: Notion Task Manager
description: The simple, powerful way to manage your daily tasksNotion Task Manager allows you to effortlessly create tasks, track progress & assign dependencies. What's included:✔ Centralized task management:Keep all of your tasks and to-dos in one place, with easy-to-use filters and sorting options to help you prioritize and stay focused.✔ Task timeline:Few tasks in timeline view, and create dependencies.✔ Customizable workflows: Adapt the template to your needs by creating custom workflows and task ca
features: Keep all of your tasks and to-dos in one place, with easy-to-use filters and sorting options to help you prioritize and stay focused.; Few tasks in timeline view, and create dependencies.; Adapt the template to your needs by creating custom workflows and task categories that fit your unique approach to getting things done.; Set priority levels for each task to help you focus on what's most important.
